sent.orig: PREHEAT oven. While preparing filling, heat oven to recommended temperature. cheesecake on middle rack of oven.
sent.trans: 准备原料时预热烤箱到推荐的温度，将蛋糕放入烤架的中层。

sent.orig: Turn oven off and let cheesecake set in oven1 hour before chilling.
sent.trans: 取出放凉再放冰箱冷藏12小时后即可。

sent.orig: From the step response of the electric oven, the model of the oven is obtained.
sent.trans: 通过测试电烤箱的阶跃响应，用作图法得到电烤箱的模型。

sent.orig: Move the lamb chop tray into the oven once the oven is ready.
sent.trans: 烤箱热了后，把羊排烤盘放到烤箱里。

sent.orig: Producing methanolfromcoke oven gas is a new route for coke oven gas(COG) application.
sent.trans: 用焦炉气制甲醇是焦炉气利用的一个新领域。
